scripts.build-closure: rollup -c && rpl "console.error" "0&&console.error" build/three.js && rpl "console.warn" "0&&console.warn" build/three.js && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --compilation_level ADVANCED --property_renaming_report build/propname.log --variable_renaming_report build/varname.log --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs utils/build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min2.js
scripts.build-closure-safe: rollup -c && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --compilation_level SIMPLE --variable_renaming_report build/varname-SAFE.log --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs utils/build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min.js
